net.tomp2p.synchronization

Class SyncBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.tomp2p.connection.DefaultConnectionConfiguration
      • net.tomp2p.dht.DHTBuilder<SyncBuilder>
        • net.tomp2p.synchronization.SyncBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConnectionConfiguration, BasicBuilder<SyncBuilder>, Builder, SignatureBuilder<SyncBuilder>

    public class SyncBuilder
extends DHTBuilder<SyncBuilder>
    The builder for the synchronization. This class first sends an info message to get the checksums, then it checks what needs to be done, (nothing, full copy, diff).
    Author:
    Thomas Bocek, Maxat Pernebayev
